sets.-&-sets comment-&-: These are used to determine what pronouns a cat is assigned when they are generated (or this language is swapped to for the first time). This allows languages with pronoun sets that don't match English 1:1 to display correctly.
sets.-&-default_comment-&-: Default is the fallback/'what-happens-if-nothing-matches' pronoun set. Also the 'they them default' value.

pronouns.adj_default_comment: This determines which section of an {ADJ} label is used but the matching cat is not supplied (e.g. as a general use of the word). The first supplied value is 1.
